pageContext.description:
This vertical format painting depicts a knight kneeling in an attitude of prayer with his two sons, who are both wearing red doublets with slashed sleeves. All three are shown in three quarter profile and gaze to the right beyond the pictorial space, suggesting the painting was originally part of a larger altarpiece. The figurative group is set against a backdrop of trees and a rocky outcrop with a fortress. A family coat of arms with a red and white shield divided into four parts (party per cross) is displayed prominently in the foreground. 
[cda 2020]
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support: 32.5 × 12.5 cm
